ParamSet.Name: TOP BelleII
ParamSet.Description: Time Of Propagation counter geometry parameters
ParamSet.Creator: TOPBelleII

Rotation.desc: Rotation of the whole TOP detector (should be the same as beampipe)

OffsetZ.desc: The offset of the whole TOP in z with respect to the IP (should be the same as beampipe)

Radius.desc: The distance from the quartz bar to the IP (inner radius)

QZForward.desc: Forward edge of the quartz bar

QZBackward.desc: Backward edge of the quartz bar

QZext.dest: Size of the extension volue of the quartz bar in the z direction

QYextup.dest: Size of the extension volue of the quartz bar in the y direction upwards

QYextdown.dest: Size of the extension volue of the quartz bar in the y direction downwards

Xgap.desc: Gap between PMTs in x direction

Ygap.desc: Gap between PMTs in y direction

x0.desc: position of the edge of lower left PMT relative to quartz bar

y0.desc: position of the edge of lower left PMT

PadXNum.desc: Number of pads in x direction

PadYNum.desc: Number of pads in y direction

lowerGap.desc: Air gap between lower plate and quartz

upperGap.desc: Air gap between lower plate and quartz

sideGap.desc: Air gap between lower plate and quartz

ZForward.desc: Forward edge of the QBB box

ZBackward.desc: Backward edge of the QBB box
